thread.title: What Emma Stone Was Thinking During That Awkward Golden Globes Hug Fail
thread.title_full: What Emma Stone Was Thinking During That Awkward Golden Globes Hug Fail

title: What Emma Stone Was Thinking During That Awkward Golden Globes Hug Fail
text: Remember Emma Stone's awkward hug fail at the Golden Globes? GIF 'That was weird, I'm sorry.' Giphy Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Stone wishes she didn't, especially after Jimmy Kimmel made her watch it twice last night. So when the host asked her to explain what happened, Stone replied with the most Emma Stone answer : "Damien certainly wants to hug NOT ME." Then she added a joke: "I'm not a highly choreographed person." The delivery of it was perfect at the 2:00 mark: Most Popular She also hasn't planned her Oscars speech ("What do you think, I just have a Rolodex of speeches?"), which Kimmel seemed quite concerned about : More from ELLE:
